name: Wireless Headphones
description: Experience immersive sound with these high-quality wireless headphones, featuring noise-cancellation and a 20-hour battery life.

name: Mechanical Keyboard
description: A durable and responsive mechanical keyboard with customizable RGB backlighting, perfect for gaming and productivity.

name: Gaming Mouse
description: Get the edge in your favorite games with this ergonomic gaming mouse, featuring a high-precision sensor and programmable buttons.

name: HD Webcam
description: A 1080p HD webcam that delivers crystal-clear video, ideal for streaming, video conferencing, and online classes.

name: Smartwatch Pro
description: Track your fitness, receive notifications, and stay connected with this sleek and powerful smartwatch.

name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: Enjoy rich, powerful sound on the go with this compact and waterproof portable Bluetooth speaker.

name: Ultra-Thin Laptop
description: A lightweight yet powerful laptop with a stunning display and all-day battery life, perfect for work and entertainment.

name: Immersive VR Headset
description: Step into new worlds and experience gaming like never before with this comfortable and high-resolution VR headset.
